episode_event_general_sm_solo/6701_1001_:
This passion, this excitement... I can feel it right
here in my heart!

It appears they’re holding a street fair here in the
town square today.

A street fair, huh? All this hustle and bustle
reminds me of the festival we hold for Tapu Koko
back home!

There’s a bunch of booths all set up, and you can
get tickets for participating in their games
and events!

And then, you can exchange those tickets
for prizes!
Why don’t we all go check it out together?

Good idea! I wonder if there’ll be any strapping
young swimmers!

I...suppose there may be, but what does that have
to do with the street fair?
OK! Let’s go check it out!
episode_event_general_sm_solo/6801_1031_:
I’m looking forward to the
street fair!
episode_event_general_sm_solo/6801_1001_:
Pasio’s such a great island to have an event
like this!
Agreed! I think we’ll enjoy ourselves a lot!
